description:
DAX (Data Analysis eXpressions) Studio is the ultimate tool for executing and analyzing DAX queries against Microsoft Tabular models.  
    
DAX Studio is a client tool for executing DAX queries against various data sources including:

* PowerPivot in Excel
* Power BI Desktop / SSDT Integrated Workspaces
* Analysis Services Tabular
* Azure Analysis Services

DAX Studio will scan the local machine for any running instances of Power BI Desktop or SSDT Integrated Workspaces.
    
#### Features

* All Queries Trace
* Bracket Matching
* Connection Dialog
* DAX Studio Ribbon
* DMV List
* DaxFormatter.com Support
* Excel - Linked Results
* Excel - Static Results
* File Menu
* Find/Replace
* Flexible Layout
* Function Metadata
* Intellisense Support
* Load Power BI Performance Data
* Metadata Panes
* Model Metadata
* Multiple Tabs
* Options Winodw
* Output Modes
* Output Panes
* Parameter Support
* Query Editor
* Query Plan Tracing
* Run Modes
* Server Timing Trace
* Status Bar
* Swap Delimiters
* Timer Results
* Version notifications
summary: The ultimate tool for executing and analyzing DAX queries
author: DAXStudio.org
